Uses of Class
model.Task

  • Packages that use Task 
    Package Description
    controller
    This package contains the controller of the application.
    It contains everything that is needed to run the application, the logic behind the program.
    There are various classes that are called classNameManager.java, these classes have a specific task to do (e.g.
    controller.persistence
    This package contains everything relates to the object persistence.
    controller.persistence.database.management
    This package contains everything related to the H2 database.
    view
    This package contains everything related to the User Interface and User Experience.

    • Uses of Task in controller

      Fields in controller declared as Task 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Task Controller.currentTask 
      Methods in controller with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void Controller.saveTask(Task task)
      This method saves a task in the file and in the database.
      Since it can be a heavy task (and it's not related to the view), a thread is created.

    • Uses of Task in controller.persistence

      Fields in controller.persistence declared as Task 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Task PersistenceManager.task 
      Methods in controller.persistence with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void FileManager.saveTask(Task task)
      This method writes a task in a file.
      static void FileManager.saveTaskOnFile(Task task)
      This method aims to save a single task on a file called report.dat: it opens/creates the file, it saves the task and it closes it.
      This method has to be used only to save a task in that file and it must not be used for bulk savings.
      Constructors in controller.persistence with parameters of type Task 
      Constructor and Description
      PersistenceManager(Task task) 

    • Uses of Task in controller.persistence.database.management

      Methods in controller.persistence.database.management that return types with arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Task> TaskDao.getDailyTask()
      This method retrieves all the task executed today.
      static java.util.List<Task> TaskDao.getTaskFromRange(java.time.LocalDateTime from, java.time.LocalDateTime to)
      This method gets a list of tasks based on a range of LocalDateTime.
      Methods in controller.persistence.database.management with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void TaskDao.saveTask(Task task)
      This method saves a task on the database.
